title: Big Hole National Battlefield: Volunteer
body: Volunteer         Volunteering at Big Hole National Battlefield NPS  Experience Your America by volunteering for the National Park Service.  Many great volunteering opportunities exist at Big Hole National Battlefield as well as parks near you.  Imagine spending your summers in beautiful western Montana while helping the National Park Service in our efforts toward education and preservation.  For information on volunteer opportunities at Big Hole National Battlefield call the park at 406-689-3155 or visit www.volunteer.gov.
